videoSnippet.title: Viking Power || Nakamura vs Carlsen || Lindores Abbey (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
New Juga song here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rX-ZY7XQuA&feature=youtu.be

Medo Arena https://lichess.org/tournament/Y13DdUBn
Friday Arena https://lichess.org/tournament/jx6KcpOm

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Hikaru Nakamura vs Magnus Carlsen
Lindores Abbey Rapid Challenge (2020), 28.5.2020
Ruy Lopez, Berlin defence (C65)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 Nf6 4. d3 Bc5 5. Bxc6 dxc6 6. O-O Bg4 7. h3 Bh5 8. g4 Nxg4 9. hxg4 Bxg4 10. Be3 Be7 11. Kh1 f5 12. Rg1 h5 13. Nc3 f4 14. Bd2 g5 15. Nb1 Bc5 16. Bc3 Bxf2 17. Nbd2 Qe7 18. Qf1 Bxg1 19. Qxg1 Bxf3+ 20. Nxf3 g4 21. Nxe5 Rg8 22. Rf1 Qg5 23. Qd4 Qh4+ 24. Kg1 Qg3+ 25. Kh1 Qh3+ 26. Kg1 g3 27. Nf3 g2 28. Re1 Qxf3 29. Qe5+ Kd8 30. Qf6+ Ke8 31. Bb4 c5 32. Bxc5 Kd7 33. Qf7+

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. b6 was best.
